summary: Ben is an art college student in London, whose imagination runs wild as he works the late-night shift at the local supermarket. What do he and his colleagues do to pass the long, endless hours of the night?
cast: Sean Biggerstaff|Emilia Fox|Stuart Goodwin|Michael Dixon|Michael Lambourne|Hatti Riemer|Frank Hesketh|Irene Bagach|Christine Fuller|Celesta Hodge|Kinvara Balfour|Cherie Nichole|Hayley-Marie Coppin|Daphne Guinness|Nia Roberts|Michelle Ryan|Janine-May Tinsley
title: Cashback
